__e: I order you to tell me how long ago this girl has been held here.
In my normal voice, I ask you to come back now because we are going to have to start all over again now. -So, come back to me, now!
If I'm in charge then I order you to do it!
In the name of my Father, I say get up!
I order you to sit down and stay out of our way.
When I order you to go, you go - even if I only want to say hello to their commander.
In my normal voice, I ask you to come back now because we are going to have to start all over again now. -So, come back to me, now!
I'm ordering you to vacate the premises.
As the son of the son of God,
You may not be as good at it as I am, but I command you to try.
As the son of God, I command you to tell me what you think.
